item.title: So Men Want Sex and Women Want Love? Ummm, NO. (3-minute Video)

So Men Want Sex and Women Want Love? Ummm, NO. (3-minute Video)

item.title: Sex As A Bargaining Chip: The Bad, The Good, And The Very Naughty
item.description:
Sex As A Bargaining Chip: The Bad, The Good, And The Very Naughty

We’ve been trained from practically day one to view sex as a commodity. For her: “Don’t give it away.” (No matter how much you want it!) For him: “Be a good provider and protector, and you’ll get love.” (Buying your way around actually becoming a great lover!) This could be the exact thing preventing you from ever havinggreatsex — sex that pulls you both back into the bedroom again and again. The more you’re having sex for some other reason, the less you’re having sex for its own sake.

item.title: How I Became Confident With Women
item.description:
How I Became Confident With Women

I was asked this in a forum. I thought about it for awhile and my answers surprised me. Here they are.
